{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Front Desk Officer",
  "description": "TalentNova HR,&nbsp;into Talent Sourcing, is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Front Desk Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Ojodu Berger, Lagos&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Keep front desk tidy and presentable with all necessary material (pens, forms, paper etc.)
	Greet and&nbsp;welcome guests
	Answer questions and address complaints
	Answer all incoming calls and redirect them or keep messages
	Receiveletters, packages etc. and distribute them
	Prepare outgoing mail by drafting correspondence, securing parcels etc.
	Check, sort and forward emails
	Monitor office supplies and place orders when necessary
	Keep updated records and files
	Monitor office expenses and costs
	Take up other duties as assigned (travel arrangements, schedules etc.)


Requirements and Skills


	High School diploma; additional qualifications will be a plus
	Proven experience as front desk representative, agent or relevant position
	Familiarity with office machines (e.g. fax, printer etc.)
	Knowledge of office management and basic bookkeeping
	Proficient in English (oral and written)
	Excellent knowledge of MS Office (especially Excel and Word)
	Strong communication and people skills
	Good organizational and multi-tasking abilities
	Problem-solving skills
	Customer service orientation.


Salary
N70,000 / Month.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their applications to:&nbsp;adisayetunde@outlook.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

  "validThrough": "2025-11-15",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

    "@type": "Organization",

  },

Front Desk Officer Job at TalentNova HR




        
    

        
        TalentNova HR, into Talent Sourcing, is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Front Desk Officer

Job Location: Ojodu Berger, Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Keep front desk tidy and presentable with all necessary material (pens, forms, paper etc.)
	Greet and welcome guests
	Answer questions and address complaints
	Answer all incoming calls and redirect them or keep messages
	Receiveletters, packages etc. and distribute them
	Prepare outgoing mail by drafting correspondence, securing parcels etc.
	Check, sort and forward emails
	Monitor office supplies and place orders when necessary
	Keep updated records and files
	Monitor office expenses and costs
	Take up other duties as assigned (travel arrangements, schedules etc.)


Requirements and Skills


	High School diploma; additional qualifications will be a plus
	Proven experience as front desk representative, agent or relevant position
	Familiarity with office machines (e.g. fax, printer etc.)
	Knowledge of office management and basic bookkeeping
	Proficient in English (oral and written)
	Excellent knowledge of MS Office (especially Excel and Word)
	Strong communication and people skills
	Good organizational and multi-tasking abilities
	Problem-solving skills
	Customer service orientation.


Salary
N70,000 / Month.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their applications to: adisayetunde@outlook.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     




        
        

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Civil Engineer for Building Projects",
  "description": "Wallthorpe Consulting - Our client, a Construction company, is&nbsp;recruiting passionate and committed professionals&nbsp;to fill the position below:

Job Position: Civil Engineer for Building Projects

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Job Code: CEBP-101

Requirements


	OND, Higher National Diploma, Bachelor&#39;s Degree in Civil Engineering or Structural Engineering (Master&#39;s degree will be an added advantage).
	Minimum of 3 - 5 years of relevant experience in building construction projects.
	COREN registration or eligibility for registration will be an added advantage.
	Proficiency in AutoCAD, Revit, Civil 30, and MS Project or Primavera will be an added advantage
	Solid understanding of structural design principles, construction methods, and materials.
	Proven experience in site supervision, project coordination, and contractor management.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a cover letter to:&nbsp;info@wallthorpeconsulting.com&nbsp;Cc:&nbsp;hr.wallthorpeconsulting@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position and Job Code you are applying for clearly stated in the cover letter as the subject of the mail.",

Civil Engineer for Building Projects Job at Wallthorpe Consulting




        
    

        
        Wallthorpe Consulting - Our client, a Construction company, is recruiting passionate and committed professionals to fill the position below:

Job Position: Civil Engineer for Building Projects

Job Location: Lagos
Job Code: CEBP-101

Requirements
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	OND, Higher National Diploma, Bachelor's Degree in Civil Engineering or Structural Engineering (Master's degree will be an added advantage).
	Minimum of 3 - 5 years of relevant experience in building construction projects.
	COREN registration or eligibility for registration will be an added advantage.
	Proficiency in AutoCAD, Revit, Civil 30, and MS Project or Primavera will be an added advantage
	Solid understanding of structural design principles, construction methods, and materials.
	Proven experience in site supervision, project coordination, and contractor management.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a cover letter to: info@wallthorpeconsulting.com Cc: hr.wallthorpeconsulting@gmail.com using the Job Position and Job Code you are applying for clearly stated in the cover letter as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Administrative Officer II",
  "description": "The Lagos University Teaching Hospital&nbsp;(LUTH) is a foremost tertiary hospital in Nigeria&nbsp;with a mandate to provide excellent services of international standard in patient care, training &amp; research.

We invite applications from suitably qualified candidates for the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Officer II

Job Location:&nbsp;Idi-Araba, Lagos

Requirements


	Candidate must possess a good Bachelor Degree (B Sc. /B.A) in any of the disciplines of Social Sciences or Humanities with not less than Second Class Lower Division/Credit Grade from a recognised University.&nbsp;


Salary
CONHESS 07 (N1,871,883 - N2,533,504) per annum and other allowances as approved by the Federal Government.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications and&nbsp;Curriculum Vitae. The Applicant&#39;s Curriculum Vitae should include the following details:


	Full Names (Surname in Capital Letters or Underlined)
	Contact Address, Phone Number(s) and E-mail Address
	Date of Birth
	Gender
	Marital Status
	State of Origin
	Local Government Area
	Educational Background with Dates
	Qualifications Obtained with Dates
	Details of One Year Post Graduation Internship (if applicable)
	Details of NYSC (if applicable)
	Working Experience with Dates, Position Held and Organisation Name
	Achievements / Merits / Awards
	Name and Addresses of Three (3) Referees.


Candidates should forward three (3) sets of their Applications, detailed Curriculum Vitae and copies of Credentials and addressed to:
The Director of Administration,
Lagos University Teaching Hospital,
P.M.B. 12003, Idi-Araba,
Lagos, Nigeria.

Note


	Documents in support of the information provided in the Curriculum Vitae should be attached to the application.
	Applicants should request their referees to forward references on their behalf directly to &quot;The Director of Administration, Lagos University Teaching Hospital, Idi-Araba, Lagos&quot;.
	LUTH does not appoint candidates with third class grades.
",
  "datePosted": "2025-11-13",
  "validThrough": "2025-12-26",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Lagos University Teaching Hospital"
    
  },

Administrative Officer II Job at Lagos University Teaching Hospital (LUTH)




        
    

        
        The Lagos University Teaching Hospital (LUTH) is a foremost tertiary hospital in Nigeria with a mandate to provide excellent services of international standard in patient care, training & research.

We invite applications from suitably qualified candidates for the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Officer II

Job Location: Idi-Araba, Lagos

Requirements
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Candidate must possess a good Bachelor Degree (B Sc. /B.A) in any of the disciplines of Social Sciences or Humanities with not less than Second Class Lower Division/Credit Grade from a recognised University. 


Salary
CONHESS 07 (N1,871,883 - N2,533,504) per annum and other allowances as approved by the Federal Government.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications and Curriculum Vitae. The Applicant's Curriculum Vitae should include the following details:


	Full Names (Surname in Capital Letters or Underlined)
	Contact Address, Phone Number(s) and E-mail Address
	Date of Birth
	Gender
	Marital Status
	State of Origin
	Local Government Area
	Educational Background with Dates
	Qualifications Obtained with Dates
	Details of One Year Post Graduation Internship (if applicable)
	Details of NYSC (if applicable)
	Working Experience with Dates, Position Held and Organisation Name
	Achievements / Merits / Awards
	Name and Addresses of Three (3) Referees.


Candidates should forward three (3) sets of their Applications, detailed Curriculum Vitae and copies of Credentials and addressed to:
The Director of Administration,
Lagos University Teaching Hospital,
P.M.B. 12003, Idi-Araba,
Lagos, Nigeria.

Note


	Documents in support of the information provided in the Curriculum Vitae should be attached to the application.
	Applicants should request their referees to forward references on their behalf directly to "The Director of Administration, Lagos University Teaching Hospital, Idi-Araba, Lagos".
	LUTH does not appoint candidates with third class grades.
    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     




        
        

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

  "description": "7treads Consults, a consultancy / recruitment services company, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities


	Manage office facilities, assets, and equipment to ensure seamless operations.
	Supervise cleaning, security, logistics, and maintenance activities.
	Coordinate vendor relationships and ensure compliance with service level agreements (SLAs).
	Oversee asset tracking, procurement, and staff logistics (transport, consumables, etc.).
	Support HR and Operations with onboarding, events, and staff welfare initiatives.
	Ensure adherence to health, safety, and regulatory standards.
	Prepare reports and manage the administrative budget efficiently.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Business Administration, Management, or related field.
	Minimum of 5 years of experience in administration or facilities management (BPO experience preferred).
	Strong organizational, leadership, and vendor management skills.
	Proficiency in MS Office and facility management tools.
	Ability to work under pressure in a 24/7 operational environment.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;mayetemitope@gmail.com&nbsp;using&nbsp;&ldquo;Administrative Manager&quot; as the subject of the email.",
  "datePosted": "2025-11-13",
  "validThrough": "2025-11-16",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

  },

      "maxValue": 0,

}



Administrative Manager Job at 7treads Consults




        
    

        
        7treads Consults, a consultancy / recruitment services company, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Manager

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Manage office facilities, assets, and equipment to ensure seamless operations.
	Supervise cleaning, security, logistics, and maintenance activities.
	Coordinate vendor relationships and ensure compliance with service level agreements (SLAs).
	Oversee asset tracking, procurement, and staff logistics (transport, consumables, etc.).
	Support HR and Operations with onboarding, events, and staff welfare initiatives.
	Ensure adherence to health, safety, and regulatory standards.
	Prepare reports and manage the administrative budget efficiently.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, Management, or related field.
	Minimum of 5 years of experience in administration or facilities management (BPO experience preferred).
	Strong organizational, leadership, and vendor management skills.
	Proficiency in MS Office and facility management tools.
	Ability to work under pressure in a 24/7 operational environment.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: mayetemitope@gmail.com using “Administrative Manager" as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

  "title": "Structural Engineer",
  "description": "Wallthorpe Consulting - Our client, a Construction company, is&nbsp;recruiting passionate and committed professionals&nbsp;to fill the position below:

Job Position: Structural&nbsp;Engineer&nbsp;

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Job Code: SEBP-102

Requirements


	OND, Higher National Diploma, Bachelor&#39;s degree in Structural Engineering or Civil Engineering (Master&#39;s degree in Structural Engineering as an added advantage).
	Minimum of 5-10 years of experience in structural design and supervision of building projects.
	Registered or eligible for registration with COREN (Council for the Regulation of Engineering in Nigeria) as an added advantage
	Proficiency in structural design and analysis software (e.g., STAAD Pro, ETABS, SAFE, AutoCAD, Revit Structure) will be an address advantage
	Strong understanding of construction materials, geotechnical principles, and load paths.
	Experience in both reinforced concrete and steel structure design.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a cover letter to:&nbsp;info@wallthorpeconsulting.com&nbsp;Cc:&nbsp;hr.wallthorpeconsulting@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position and Job Code you are applying for clearly stated in the cover letter as the subject of the mail.",

  "validThrough": "2025-12-01",

  },

Structural Engineer Job at Wallthorpe Consulting




        
    

        
        Wallthorpe Consulting - Our client, a Construction company, is recruiting passionate and committed professionals to fill the position below:

Job Position: Structural Engineer 

Job Location: Lagos
Job Code: SEBP-102

Requirements
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	OND, Higher National Diploma, Bachelor's degree in Structural Engineering or Civil Engineering (Master's degree in Structural Engineering as an added advantage).
	Minimum of 5-10 years of experience in structural design and supervision of building projects.
	Registered or eligible for registration with COREN (Council for the Regulation of Engineering in Nigeria) as an added advantage
	Proficiency in structural design and analysis software (e.g., STAAD Pro, ETABS, SAFE, AutoCAD, Revit Structure) will be an address advantage
	Strong understanding of construction materials, geotechnical principles, and load paths.
	Experience in both reinforced concrete and steel structure design.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a cover letter to: info@wallthorpeconsulting.com Cc: hr.wallthorpeconsulting@gmail.com using the Job Position and Job Code you are applying for clearly stated in the cover letter as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply
